text:
Nginep di sini saat malam Tahun Baru. Beruntung masih bisa dapat kamar karena saat itu hotel cukup ramai dan pesannya agak mepet. Lokasinya dekat dengan halte Transjakarta, sehingga ramah bagi pengguna transportasi umum.

Walaupun hotelnya tidak terlalu besar, ukuran kamarnya cukup lega (untuk ukuran hotel budget) berkat penataan interior yang baik. Kamar mandi tidak terlalu besar, tapi tertata dengan baik. Sayangnya saya sempat mendapati bantal yang kotor.  Untungnya tidak ada masalah lain di kamar selain bantal.

Pilihan sarapan terbatas (mungkin karena keterbatasan pegawai atau alasan keterbatasan budget?), selain itu rasanya juga biasa-biasa saja. Meski terbatas, tersedia roti tawar, salad dan buah. Ada "hidden menu" yaitu bubur kacang hijau.

text:
Holiday Inn Express Matraman,
Sebuah properti Holiday Inn Express di jakarta timur dan menjadi satu-satunya properti HIEx disana. 
Merupakan properti terbaik, terbaru, dan terjangkau. HIEx ini merupakan properti HIEx favorit saya, karena properti ini sangat mengutamakan kepuasan tamu dari segi kebersihan, kenyamanan, dan servis. 

Hotel ini terdiri dari 8 lantai dan memiliki 1 kamar spesial dimana tamu spesial pasti diarrange untuk stay di kamar tersebut. Kamar itu ada di lantai 7. 
Kita bisa menemukan lobby di lantai G. Lantai 1 adalah gym dan laundry dan meeting room, lantai 2 meeting room, lantai 3-8 adalah guest room. 

Tidak usah khawatir, kamar anda adalah kamar terbersih dan terbaik. Best view dari HIEx Matraman adalah menghadap Jalan Matraman Raya. 

Breakfast disini bisa ditemui di Great Room di lantai G. 
Banyak variasi, namun tetap enak untuk disantap. 

Tanyakan semua yang berkaitan dengan fnb kepada Mas Rahmat, dia tahu makanan yang terbaik untuk para tamu. 

Tanyakan semua yang berkaitan dengan reservasi anda, IHG loyalty member, dan hal lain yang berkaitan dengan hotel, kepada Ibu Eka, Ibu Hani, Ibu Puput, Ibu Fitri, dan HIEx FO Team. Mereka dengan senang hati akan membantu tamu. 

Holiday Inn Express Matraman ini, dinahkodai oleh seorang Ibu yang sangat luar biasa yaitu Ibu Tika. Seorang Ibu yang bermotto "hotel kami adalah hotel Holiday Inn Express, tujuan kami adalah service excellence". 

True, memang betul service disini luar biasa. Berkali-kali saya stay disini dan saya merasa, service disini 1000% berbeza dengan HIEx lain, disini tingkat care dan smart solution nya sangat tinggi. 
Bagi tamu non repeater, mereka excellence. 
Bagi tamu repeater seperti saya, Team HIEx Matraman sdh tidak seperti orang asing, semuanya luar biasa. 

Jangan ragu kalau mau stay di HIEx Matraman, orang-orangnya welcome banget kok, ga cuman ke repeat guest, ke tamu non repeat juga emg baik.
title: HIEx Matraman, Properti Holiday Inn Express terbaik

Kamar lebih kecil ukurannya. Walau hotel baru, tapi ada noda di karpet.
Semua non smoking room, denda 1 juta kalau sampai merokok. Tidak tanggung2 ya..
Make up kamar per 5 hari sekali, kecuali buang sampah, walau tamu keluar kamar. Katanya ini aturan dari Pemerintah..
Padahal kemarin2 saya di hotel lain bisa dibersihkan tiap hari.
Siapa juga yang mau stay di kamar saat kamar di make up, ya pasti keluar lah. Karena hotel ini ya cocok buat tidur aja bentar.
Tidak ada sofa duduk seperti Holiday Inn Express yang lain, entah ada kursi kecil ini maksudnya sebagai gantinya mungkin ya.
title: Non Smoking Hotel dengan standard beda dengan hotel serupa

owner_response.text:
Dear Bapak Arifien,

Salam hangat dari Holiday Inn Express Jakarta Matraman.

Terimakasih atas waktu yang diluangkan untuk mengisi review mengenai hotel kami dan mohon maaf apabila ada yang tidak berkenan dengan Bapak.

Mengenai kamar yang ukurannya lebih kecil daripada Holiday Inn Express yang lain, hanya sebagai informasi ukuran kamar kami adalah 18 meter persegi dan didesain semaksimal mungkin untuk kenyamanan tamu. Kami mohon maaf apabila ada noda di karpet dan akan kami tindak lanjuti untuk memperbaiki hal in kedepannya.

Untuk proses pembersihan kamar tamu yang menginap lebih dari 5 hari, ini adalah salah satu progam dari IHG. Hal ini dilakukan untuk keamanan dan kenyamanan Bapak selama menginap bersama kami, namun apabila Bapak ingin kamarnya untuk dibersihkan setiap hari maka kami akan membersihkan kamar sesuai dengan permintaan Bapak.

Bapak Arifien, sekali lagi terimakasih atas saran dan masukannya untuk Hotel Holiday Inn Express Jakarta Matraman agar kami ke depannya lebih baik lagi.


Murti Kartikasari (Tika)
Hotel Manager

text:
Bingung cari hotel yang dekat dengan acara sepupu nikah. Akhirnya keluarga memutuskan menginap disini. Pesan 5 Kamar dan ternyata ada kamar yang Connecting Door.. (Buat Kaka dan Keluarganya).
Kamar : 4/5
Kamar Mandi : 3.8/5 karena tidak ada kuncinya (atau saya tidak menemukan kuncinya) dan tidak menemukan sisir.
Pelayanan Resepsionis : 4/5 ramah
Satpam : 4/5 Ramah
Breakfast: 4/5 lumayan lengkap makanan ( disini juga bisa grab n go sarapan, kalau yg buru2 bisa menggunakan ini. Makan di perjalanan dan staf juga ramah.

Tempat strategis.. dekat dengan halte busway dan toko buku.

Makan malam? Bisa menggunakan Ojek Online. Satpamnya juga ramah ke ojol.

text: Saya check in sekitar akhir November 2019. Saya check in tengah malam,ketika datang ke konter staff resepsinis asik main hp sendiri,tidak sadar kalau saya datang ingin check in. Proses check in cepat tp dilayani dg judes/tidak friendly/no hospitality sama sekali. Lift banyak tp sensor agak lambat karena agak susah press tombol angka nya. Breakfast enak,agak lengkap dan ada milo sachet jg tersedia. Kamar bagus,perlengkapan kamar mandi jg lengkap,tp toiletres harus on call baru dikasi. Kalau towel lengkap tersedia. Parkir motor tidak efisien karena diluar dan tidak ada kanopinya. Staff siang jg agak judes dalam berbicara dalam melayani guest by call. Untuk harga agak sedikit mahal. Saya pinjam mangkok tp ukurannya terlalu kecil,sehingga tidak efisien jika ukurannya terlalu kecil. Staff restoran ramah,security juga ramah,tp resepsionis agak judes.

text:
Saya dan teman-teman mengadakan reuni sekolah kami menggunakan Meeting room dan Ruang restaurant karena itu merupakan lunch meeting. Sebelum memantapkan acara reuni tersebut, saya coba mencari beberapa alternative tempat event, salah satu nya Holiday Inn Express Matraman. Saya dihandle oleh Sales PIC - Ms Regita. Setelah diskusi dengan rekan panitia yang lain, tanpa memakan waktu lama, kami memutuskan untuk menyelengarakan event reuni kami di hotel ini.
Pengalaman saya & teman-teman lain menggunakan hotel ini untuk event sangat memuaskan, walaupun sebelum nya sempat diinfo perubahan ruang meeting. Namun akhir nya kami mendapatkan ruang meeting yang sesuai dengan kapasitas  jumlah peserta event. Ruang meeting bagus dengan pencahayaan dan fasilitas lengkap, juga tersedia Toilet di Ruang meeting besar.  Restaurant juga nyaman dan ukuran ruangan cukup besar untuk menampung kira-kira sekitar 40 - 50 orang. Makanan cukup enak dengan ragam menu yang variatif, Dan yang terutama adalah Staff hotel yang sangat ramah dan membantu mulai dari sebelum acara berlangsung sampai sesudah acara selesai. Mulai dari sales, receptionist team, banquet team, teknisi dan juga security. 
Secara keseluruhan saya dan teman-teman sangat puas menggunakan pelayanan di Holiday Inn Express Matraman dan sangat merekomendasikan apabila ada yang memerlukan event-event skala kecil dan sedang di hotel ini.
Terima kasih untuk pelayanan nya dan semoga semakin sukses!
title: Good Service for Special Event

text: Menginap selama 4 malam. Periode malam tahun baru jg. Hotelnya bersih. Kamar bersih. Kamar mandi bersih. Utk luas kamar lumayan, tidak terlalu besar tp cukup. Ac dingin, sprei dan handuk yg bersih. Overall utk kamar sangat dijaga kebersihannya. Sarapan pagi cukup variatif. Utk rasanya ya lumayan, ada bbrp makanan yg agak asin. Pelayanan staffnya lumayan ramah. Hanya saat membawa barang di troli tidak ditawarkan utk dibantu sampai kamar. Satpam ada yg baik krn mau membantu mengganti ban mobil yg bocor di parkiran (saya lupa namanya tp dia rumahnya di tambun bekasi, thanks for helping, sangat membantu sekali).. ada jg bbrp satpam yg agak cuek, kurang ramah n senyum. Tp ada jg bbrp satpam yg ramah. Resepsionis pelayanannya cukup cepat, ramah dan cukup membantu. Yg perlu diperhatikan adalah parkiran mobil yg sempit, apalagi saat malam tahun baru sangat ramai mobil sehingga parkiran pun penuh dan ruwet sekali, mau mengeluarkan mobil pun butuh setengah jam.

text: hotel baru dari oktober kemaren. saya menginap 5 hari disini. untuk lokasi bagus krn dekat juga dengan banyak tempat makan. hanya dengan jalan kaki. pegawai ramah. terutama resepsionis yang namanya novica. kamar termasuk luas dikelasnya. dan ada smoking room nya. kamar mandi bagus. hanya shower agak susah mengatur air panas nya. lorong menuju kamar berkarpet dan wangi. di lantai 1 ada fasilitas meeting. dan 1 kamar di sulap menjadi musolla. ada fitnes yg bisa diakses 24 jam dengan kartu kunci kamar. hanya saja tdk lengkap. alat beban hanya barbel. lainnya cardio. dan yang unik ada kamar laundry ada mesin cuci pakai koin dan setrika. tp belum mencoba. untuk breakfast lumayan. tp g ada egg corner. restorannya hanya dibuka buat breakfast. di kamar bisa pesan makanan di luar. tp g bisa dikirim kekamar. kita turun untuk ambil. tempat sampah diluar kamar g ada. ini agak susah kalau mau buang sampah di luar. selebihnya untuk kelas bintang 3 sudah sempurna.

text:
Menginap di hotel ini bersama istri dan 2 anak (pesan 2 kamar) cukup menyenangkan, kami menginap setelah hotel ini baru buka dan diresmikan beberapa hari sebelumnya jadi hotel ini masih benar-benar baru dan bersih.
Lokasi hotel ini cukup strategis dan memudahkan kami untuk menuju tempat kuliner maupun pusat perbelanjaan.
Pertama kami datang di hotel ini petugas keamanan cukup baik dalam memeriksa kendaraan dan mempersilakan parkir di area parkir, saat kami turun ada petugas yang menawarkan mengangkat tas/barang bawaan ke dalam lobby hotel.
Saat memasuki hotel petugas resepsionis juga ramah dan cepat dalam melayani kami.
Untuk kamar cukup nyaman dan dapat beristirahat dengan tenang, di kamar juga disediakan brankas, lemari pendingin, serta sudah pasti tempat menyimpan pakaian, yang cukup unik disediakan sejenis senter juga.
Untuk kamar mandi juga bersih dan semua berfungsi dengan baik.
Mengenai sarapan relatif baik walau tidak terlalu banyak variasi, petugas juga sangat membantu dalam melayani tamu.
Saat check out pelayanan tetap ramah dan cepat dalam melayani kami.
Secara keseluruhan kami cukup puas, semoga Holiday Inn Express Jakarta Matraman tetap dapat menjaga kebersihan dan pelayanannya.
title: Hotel baru dengan lokasi strategis

text: We spent two night, everything still looks and smell new. Single bed was good enough for two with four pillow ( unfortunately not too comfort for us, but ok ). All equipment still working very good ( Ac, mini refrigerator, wwter cattle but we did not try deposite box ). Bathroom was our favorite complete with very  firm body, hand and face towel and very nice shower area. Buffet breakfast was simply ( rice, egg, salad, bread ) but they provide cofffee machine for latte or cappucino. Staff was friendly and attentive. Walkable to some resto ( sederhana, handayani or pizza hut ), drugstore and gramedia bookstore. Easy access to transjakarta and other public transport if you want yo explore jatinegara market, senen market or ancol.

text:
I stayed just one night and was really impressed with the value I got for the price paid. The staff is really friendly and accommodating especially Ms Dianita. My Diamond membership was recognized and was treated very well. 

The breakfast selection is very decent for the price. This property was half the price of several other IHG properties in the cities. I shared some suggestions with Ms Dianita on areas that could be further improved and I even received some extra points for this.

I truly believe that the value for money was incredible.
title: Incredible Value

text:
This hotel rated as 3 stars hotel so I don't have high expectation, but I'm really impressed with the hotel quality.
The hotel building and environment is clean and chic, the check in is seamless and the staff is polite.
The room is very clean an edgy. Great room size with a nice queen size bed. The design is minimalist but function very well. Large window just at the bedside provide much lighting and great city view and street view. The bathroom itself is clean and modern with a nice rainfall shower.
The lowdown of my stay maybe for the breakfast, since when I took my breakfast the restaurant was swarmed by guests and the staffs look overwhelmed, especially since they served the breakfast one by one per guests to prevent Covid spread. Nonetheless, the food still OK.
Overall, it's a nice stay with great room and environment.
title: Superb room, mediocre breakfast

text:
I think this is my 4th time stay at this hotel and there's a reason why I keep coming back.
+ Staff. Everyone was so friendly, helpful, and made my stay more comfy. Shout out to miss Hani who gave an excellent service.
+ Room. The room was always great and clean. Bed was super comfortable and clean. I love the shower and bathroom styling. View from room is okay I guessed as long as you get a room in the higher floor. There's a table for work, a safe, and a mini refrigerator.
+ Location. The location is also great, close to book store, banks, gas station, convenience store, bus station, lot of restaurants, and have pharmacy in the same building.
With the published price, this is a hotel with a great value.
Somethings could be improved:
- Breakfast. Since C19 situations, breakfast was boxed and need to be picked up at restaurants. Even though I request a specific menu, they didn't make it. The breakfast was okay but the taste could be improved.
title: Always good

text:
This hotel support the government’s policy that every guest should show vaccination certificates to stay here. 

On my evening arrival,the security didnt welcome me. Just told me to check my temperature.
Anyway check in process was smooth, they greet me as a member, explained everything, it was quick.
The room, the bed, the bathroom, all were clean.
Their in room breakfast was simple but tasty, they also served side meal as soup, or cereal.
The only hiccup was the aircon, it took a bit longer for the room to be cool. I believe they realized it since they called about 30mins after I entered my room.

It was a pleasant stay, I would love to come back later.
title: Nice, Clean, Affordable hotel

text:
Being an IHG Platinum Membership here is meaningless if you stay at this Hotel. I booked a room for my brother and he is a Platinum member in IHG Group. There are no special services provided at all. Today suddenly he could not come to check in at the hotel. because the room was booked and guaranteed with my credit card, then he couldn't help but give it to someone else. At check-in they asked for another payment because my credit card was only a guarantee. I informed them that I only guaranteed the room so I sent money to the guest and he paid with his debit card, so where still I pay. I asked for proof of the guest folio because for the evidence that I will submit later, but when it was sent it did not include the IHG membership number, so I called the reservation department to enter the IHG number in the guest folio. It's natural that the room is booked with a membership number but why is there no number in the folio? After about 5-6 hours they just sent an email, but it was not the Guest Folio that I got, they even said that because the one checking in was not my brother, they would not give a point. I was very upset because for hours I waited for my folio to be sent with an IHG number but they gave me bad information. I didn't get what I asked for instead they talked about other bad news .. I called them and said what I needed was a Guest Folio. They insisted that they did not want to give the guest folio because it was not my younger brother who checked in. strange?? very strange !! and they said that my younger brother had to come back tomorrow with an Identity card and had to pay again even though, they already had my credit card number and took the payment from the guest debit card, even though it was the money I transferred to him because the hotel refused bank transfer or SOF, really the rules are very rigid. all they wanted was my younger brother paid the money again and they refunded the guest debit card which must have been a hassle to have to return the money again from the debit card.
I really don't understand this hotel, especially the receptionist Hanipah. being Platinum in this hotel was treated very badly, on the grounds because my brother didn't come. Maybe I won't think about continuing to become a member here or staying at this property again.
title: The Worst service even to its platinum members

text:
This newly built Holiday Inn Express is not in central Jakarta, but it is at East Jakarta. If you are having business or want to be near to the Medical School of University of Indonesia, then this is the best choice. The hotel is just in front of a huge bookstore Gramedia and the Transjakarta bus stop is just in front of the hotel door. You can take Transjakarta to every parts of Jakarta as this public transportation has extensive line covering all parts of Jakarta. If you are coming from Soekarno Hatta International Airport, you can take Damri airport bus bound for Mangga Dua area, then change to Transjakarta into Kampung Melayu direction. The hotel bus stop is called “Tegalan” or just let the conductor know that you are heading to Gramedia. The nearest train station is Jatinegara train station, almost all train coming from Bandung will stop at Jatinegara station. 
Hotel lobby is clean and have plenty chairs. The breakfast area is just around the lobby and they serve quite nice food. Free coffee and they have very nice coffee every morning. The lobby has three lifts and work with your keycard for security purpose. The room is superb, bright, clean and huge windows. The bathroom is clean and the water power is strong with rain showers. Toilets amenities are tooth brush and liquid soap. Two pairs of slippers are provided in each room. Private security box in each room. Complimentary coffee and tea with kettle. The bed is very comfortable with two type of pillow for your choice. In the hotel there is a fitness center but no swimming pool. Overall, this is the best hotel in East Jakarta, and highly recommended. Certainly will return.
title: Clean, neat and ease of transportation

text:
This is my 3rd stay at the hotel, and I deeply regret to write down the review as below. 

Upon check in @16.00pm everything is smooth, I was informed as requested a queen sized bed with non smoking room. Happy fast and friendly welcome from Ms. Puput. 

I got room 812, but since I am not a fan of connecting room, I rushed to call operator, front desk no one pick up the home phone for about 10-15 mins. I called from my mobile phone to hotel several times as well and finally I was picked up. PIc advised he was just hang up another phone call (are you working alone?) 
I requested to be moved to another room after 2x informing that i just checked in and not using the room yet.Called picked up @16.28pm.

I believe not too difficult to check on the system which room available without connecting room.
No update until 16.48, called FO again picked up by Ms. Puput (the one that checked me in), advised that someone is coming and I will be moved to 829. (At least, you can contact me if you got another room please?) 

Waiting until after 5pm, someone came up with the key after another call to FO ...Ms. Puput advised the PIC is at elevator already. 

Guess what? I got another connecting room 😅. Are they kidding us? Room number 829.

I can’t be more patient (so sorry for this) and laughing to FO team and saw at least 4 people there looking for another room for me (I guess they are expecting me coming too 😔😣) 

I managed to get the correct room with unable to be used key after I got in to the lift.

Apology made by the team, but I am dissapointed already... 
1.Your PMS (property management system)should show at least information about connecting rooms. 
2.You also can contact me if you found another room while we’re waiting in vain
3. You can also check before giving another room
4. You can check the key card correctly updated before handed over to guests.

I apologies as well to bu Lidya (GM of the property), to report this online. I really hope my writing could help you to improve the team performance. 

I remain happy to stay and willing to come again to this lovely property but please upgrade the performance 🙇🏻‍♀️.

Thank You
title: Nice room, Great location, Good property but Not a good service as expected

人行道要走去吃飯也不是很方便，不過飯店本身CP值在機場火車開到附近後，可以說是非常好。
title: 很便宜

owner_response.text:
Dear 很便宜,

Thank you for sharing the review of the experience of staying at Holiday Inn Express Jakarta Matraman.

We feel happy to receive the positive reviews that you have stated above. We hope that the quality of our services is in line with your expectations.

Once again, we thank you for your visit. We look forward to welcoming you back to our hotel in the future.

Regards,
Murti Kartikasari (Tika)
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: ジャカルタのホリデイ・インは、世界的にみてもかなり低価格な水準で販売されていますが、比較的最近IHGのプロパティに加わったこちらのホテルも例外ではありません。ブランド的に豪奢な部屋はありませんが、無料朝食に、ランドリーまで利用できてfave hotel並の料金となれば、文句のつけようがありません。

text: 這家飯店非常的新，大廳裝潢非常漂亮，雖然前台辦理入住效率有點差，房間大小稍嫌小了一點，不過空間配置蠻好的，床也非常的舒服，由於是智選假日飯店，所以都附早餐，早餐雖然沒有說很精緻，不過也足夠多樣了，口味也很不錯。
title: 嶄新的飯店

Priskilla Wanda
